name: ApnaComplex
overview:
ApnaComplex is a web-based Residential Layout and Apartment Management software solution.

ApnaComplex is is a one stop, secure, comprehensive web based software for residential layout and apartment complex management. Usage of ApnaComplex by owners association improves efficiency of operations & maintenance, reduces the maintenance costs of a residential complex.

ApnaComplex enables associations and property developers to provide many online services to the owners and tenants such as raising and tracking complaints, knowing outstanding dues and payments made, instant receipt issuance, free advertisements, online notice boards. Owners Associations will be able to manage the complex more efficiently with help of accounting tools to track maintenance dues, payments, see trends of expenses and take actions towards reducing expenses and many more.
